snippet.title: Once upon a time in Roswell Trailer - 1947 Alien Horror Game - 4K
snippet.description:
Quarter Circle Games are excited to announce The Peterson Case. A first person horror game set shortly after the 1947 Roswell Crash.

The trailer is representative of the actual gameplay experience.

Coming to PS4, Xbox and PC

https://store.steampowered.com/app/907500/Once_Upon_A_Time_In_Roswell/

Made in Unity.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/qcg_dev
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/www.qcgames....

https://www.qcgames.co.uk
